name: iati-{{ISO3}}
title: Current IATI aid activities in {{NAME}}
notes: Live list of active aid activities for {{NAME}} shared via the International Aid Transparency Initiative (IATI). Includes both humanitarian and development activities. More information on each activity (including financial data) is available from http://www.d-portal.org
license_other: Allowed licenses for IATI reporting organisations are listed at https://iatistandard.org/en/guidance/preparing-organisation/organisation-data-publication/how-to-license-your-data/
caveats:
Information originates from multiple IATI reporting organisations, and has not been centrally vetted or audited for accuracy or consistency.  

Includes only those activities from the [IATI Registry](https://iatiregistry.org/) that are included in [D-Portal](http://www.d-portal.org) and have the status "Implementing".

The total number of activities may include duplicates, if (for example) a donor and an implementing partner both report the same activity under different IATI identifiers.

Start and end dates of activities within the dataset will differ.

resources.description: Currently-active IATI activities in {{NAME}}, in 3W/4W style with HXL hashtags. This dataset contains one unique activity/sector combination on each row. It is suitable for counting the total number of reported activities, or for aggregating activities by sector, reporting organisation, etc.
resources.name: IATI activities in {{NAME}} (no location information)

resources.description: Current IATI activity locations in {{NAME}}, in 3W/4W style with HXL hashtags. This dataset contains one row per location, so activities with multiple locations are repeated, and activities without location information are omitted. It is suitable for applications that want to show activity locations on a map, or find the closest geolocated activities to a settlement or camp.
resources.name: IATI activity locations in {{NAME}}
